short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Infinite Craft right in your web-browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you enjoy crafting and building your own virtual world? Infinite Craft is the perfect game for you. With this extension, you can play Infinite Craft easily right in your browser. Just open your browser, click the icon, and start creating.

Infinite Craft is a simple and creative sandbox-style game that lets you build anything you can imagine by combining two elements.

The fun part is sometimes Infinite Craft jumps the gun by creating some crazy things like, if you combine women + car then it will create a "car crash" element. haha... LOL

If you like challenges, try recreating real-world landmarks. Maybe you want to build the Eiffel Tower or a famous bridge. It takes time, but it’s rewarding to see your creations come together.

With the help of this Infinite Craft chrome extension, you can play other interesting games as well.

I hope you give Infinite Craft a try. I’d love to hear what you think about it. Feel free to leave a review or share your ideas.
